Title: The Paradine Case
Writer: Robert Hichens (from the novel by), Alma Reville (adaptation), David O. Selznick (screen play)
Actors: Gregory Peck, Ann Todd, Charles Laughton, Charles Coburn
Plot: Highly successful London barrister Anthony Keane takes on the case of Italian Maddalena Paradine who is accused of poisoning her blind military hero husband. Keane comes increasingly under her spell, threatening both his marriage and his career.
